compatibility.notes: The GPL-2.0-with-GCC-exception allows linking with proprietary software under certain conditions, but static linking may impose stricter requirements than dynamic linking.

incompatible_with: Commercial licenses that do not allow GPL-2.0

key_requirements: Comply with the terms of the GPL v2 license.

license.name: GPL-2.0-with-GCC-exception
obligations: Must disclose source code when distributing modified versions of the software.
Must include a copy of the GPL license when distributing the software.
Must include copyright notices when distributing the software.
Must state changes made to the original software when distributing modified versions.
